entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
